question.title: Problem in building Android Java library in VS 2022 .Net 6 C#
question.body:
I have a Bixolon printer R200III, and I want to print from an Android application in a VS 2022 C# Android app.
However, the printer SDK is provided as an AAR file.

I built an Android Java library in VS 2022 using .Net 6.
I added the bixolon_pdf.aar file to the Jars folder and changed the Build Action to AndroidExternalJavaLibrary and also tried AndroidLibrary to test.
I then added the project reference to a basic app, but the namespaces do not appear in the project.

I also added a Metadata.xml file:

<metadata>
    <attr path="/api/package[@name='com.bixolon.pdflib']"
          name="managedName">com.bixolon.pdflib</attr>

</metadata>

But nothing happened.
